title: Toloki (2000) Genesis Portion
description: Tolaki (To'olaki) is the major language of Southeast Sulawesi, Indonesia. It is an Austronesian language of the Celebic branch.
provider: The British and Foreign Bible Society

language.name: Tolaki
language.area: Southeast Sulawesi, Konawe, South Konawe, Kolaka and North Kolaka districts. Mekongga in Mekongga Mountains, near west edge Soroako.
